# enablePostProcessing

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the instruction requires post processing.

## Declaration

```swift
var enablePostProcessing: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If no post processing is required for the whole duration of the video composition instruction, set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to make the composition process more efficient.

The value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] by default.

## Configuring the instructions

- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the composition.
- **layerInstructions**: Instructions that specify how to layer and compose video frames from source tracks.
- **timeRange**: The time range to which the instruction applies.
